name: MosaicHunter
tagline: A tool to detect postzygotic single-nucleotide mosaicism from unpaired, trio, or paired samples.
body:
MosaicHunter 
============
A tool to detect postzygotic single-nucleotide mosaicism from unpaired, trio, or paired samples.
See http://mosaichunter.cbi.pku.edu.cn/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
